name: Mega Man-War Of Robots
description:
★★★★★★★INSTRUCTIONS★★★★★★★

- Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump
- Space to fire your blaster
- Press C to dash
- Press Up or W when in the air to Double Jump
- Press Z or X to switch Special Weapons (if you have any)

- Mobile supported as well

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Mega Man's creator, Dr. Light, has recently finished building his newest robot, which he calls Ultrabot. The evil Dr. Wily hears about this, and sends 3 of his  Robot Masters to go steal Ultrabot's parts. It is up to Mega Man to save Ultrabot before Dr. Wily turns it into an evil war machine.

Fight against Bright Man, Napalm Man, and Search Man in 3 unique levels. Defeat them to take their Special Weapon, which you can use in battle against the other Robot Masters.

- Ultrabot and all the levels used were completely made by me
